meaningMnemonic: 浮く means "to float," and 浮かれる draws on that metaphor of "floating" to mean <vocabulary>to be happy</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to be in high spirits</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to be elated</vocabulary>. We have the same metaphor in English — think of being "on cloud nine."
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 浮く, so if you know that you' are going <vocabulary>to be happy</vocabulary> and you won't have a <reading>care</reading> (かれる) in the world!
